use_case: Complete business automation for tree service businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Tree Service business owners, home services professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for tree service businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the tree service industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for tree service services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Tree Service businesses wanting to automate operations
New tree service businesses needing a complete system
Established home services companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Tree Service Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Tree Service Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
